definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: thrust down, out, or away (NH id.; Ar. labit.a strike the ground with a person, i.e. throw one down; Syr. Pa. labet. incitavit, stimulavit);—only

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. be thrust down, away, i.e. ruined; [[עָם לאׁ יׇבִין יִלָּבֵט]] Ho 4:14; [[אֱוִיל שְׂפָתַיִם יִלָּבֵט]] Pr 10:8, Pr 10:10.
